nodes.text: Avalanche Software is a company based in Salt Lake City, Utah and owned by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. They were founded in 1995, and were later acquired in 2005 by Buena Vista Games, which was later renamed Disney Interactive Studios. They were the main developer on Disney Infinity 3.0, which was the first and final Star Wars project produced by them until their acquisition by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment in 2017.
